parameter.name: Description
parameter.defaultValue: DrL is one of the few force-directed layout algorithms that can scale to over 1 million nodes, making it ideal for large graphs. DrL expects the edges to be weighted, directed edges where the weight (greater than zero) denotes how similar the two nodes are (higher is more similar).

parameter.name: Reference
